message: you turn into a fish
you turn into a pencil
you turn into an inverted mermaid
you turn into a ball of string
you turn into a gummy bear
you survive a deadly encounter
you marry it and have two beautiful children Nathaniel and Supa Fly
you realize it is also a comic loving nerd just like you and you make a new friend
you are told to put your hands on the oodles of noodles and you ask chicken or beef
you are forced to sing along to a song you don't know
you get coal for Christmas
you feel surprised that nothing happened
you get an F- in geography
you receive an attaboy from your dear old dad
you discover a strange new addiction
you discover a strange new obsession
you learn a new skill
you get a permanent pizza stain on your upper lip
you are given a first class one way ticket to Albuquerque
you get hired to work the Night Shift at a pizzeria
you find that your terror farts just saved your life
you moon walk out of the situation
you capitalize on the confusion and run away safe
